    • Uses of FloatInputPoll in ccre.channel

      Subinterfaces of FloatInputPoll in ccre.channel 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  FloatInput
      A FloatInput is a way to get the current state of a float input, and to subscribe to notifications of changes in the float input's value.
      Classes in ccre.channel that implement FloatInputPoll 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FloatStatus
      A virtual node that is both a FloatOutput and a FloatInput.
